content.event: COURSE: Production Ready Serverless taught by Yan Cui, €880
content.description: Start with an intro to Lambda, moving onto API security, testing strategies, CI/CD, secret management, and operational best practices for monitoring & troubleshooting.

Join us for the Serverless Tech Office Hours on Twitch to ask all of your serverless questions. In this edition, we will have Sara Gerion, Sohan Maheshwar and Marek Kuczynski share their experiences and answer questions from the audience.

Implementar e provisionar serviços de autenticação, autorização e gerenciamento de usuários para os seus aplicativos móveis e web pode ser desafiador. Nessa apresentação vamos ver como o Amazon Cognito pode agilizar esse processo, através da arquitetura Serverless e provisionamento de infraestrutura como código utilizando o Serverless Framework.
The Cloud Compute brings you free Webinar on Fundamentals of Azure Serverless Computing.

content.event: Build HTTP-based API endpoints using Azure Functions
content.description: Topics that will be covered during this session: A robust developer experience, A wide range of triggering options, An innovative way of accessing and processing data, “Serverless” execution model, Open source runtime that runs anywhere, Other benefits, Demo

content.event: Refactoring a distributed monolith to AWS micro services
content.description:
Presented by Rehan van der Merwe -- AWS junkie, AWS SA, and AWS HERO.
This presentation shows the thought process and steps involved in refactoring a distributed monolith to microservices. We are going to remove API Gateway, use Amazon Event Bridge, and implement BASE consistency in the system to truly decouple the microservices.

content.event: Serverless Minimalism: How to architect your apps to save 98% on your Azure bill
content.description:
Dan Bass will join us on Integration Monday to talk about a Realworld Serverless solution. 

Hear how we saved 98% on our Azure bill by using a Serverless architecture instead of a PaaS architecture and learn how you can do the same. Also, get to know how we surfaced resource costs to developers that enabled them to make informed decisions on what architecture to choose!

This month, we will be coming together to talk about all things Serverless with some AWS Serverless Heroes. The format is open discussion, so come join Six Feet Up and your fellow Amazonians to chat about Serverless, any AWS issues you might need help on, and the latest in AWS!

content.event: Mastering the AWS Serverless Application Model (AWS SAM)
content.description: The AWS Serverless Application Model (AWS SAM) is an open-source framework for building serverless applications, and in this tech talk you’ll learn how to use SAM templates to manage serverless infrastructure as code. From serverless specific resources to pseudo parameters, you’ll learn how to construct highly flexible and re-usable SAM templates to manage your serverless application.

Chaos engineering has moved from being a buzzword to something companies are adopting to help verify the output of their systems. In this session Gunnar Grosch will cover the motivations behind chaos engineering, how we perform chaos experiments, and run some actual experiments in an environment to see how it can help us build reliable applications.

content.event: Nimbella and Postman: From APIs to Serverless Cloud Applications in Minutes
content.description: APIs are at the heart of all modern-day applications. With Postman, developers can design and test their APIs, and generate mock servers to facilitate the development of cloud and mobile applications. Today, we're taking the Postman developer journey to the next level, with Nimbella.

content.event: WEBINAR: Advanced Serverless Debugging through Observability
content.description: We will be covering the advanced techniques of observability, debugging and operations with large-scale serverless environments. We'll be looking at the best practices for ingesting and navigating logs, metrics and traces to easily understand the state of your application and develop confidence in your operational practices, as well as effectively navigating data, managing processes and data viz.

content.event: Build Modern Serverless Applications with GraphQL APIs and AWS AppSync
content.description: In this tech talk, join AppSync’s Product Manager Ed Lima to learn use cases and how customers are using AppSync as well as how AppSync powers AWS Amplify features. Features highlighted will be Amplify DataStore offline capabilities with built-in versioning, conflict detection and resolution as well as Amplify Predictions where you can interact with multiple AI/ML services.

content.event: Networking Best Practices for Your Serverless Applications
content.description: How should you configure your subnets, route tables, and other networking aspects to best support your application’s needs? In this tech talk we'll cover best practices for security, high availability, and cost. We'll also review service endpoints, cross account access, and provide insight on how to minimize the configuration overhead of a large virtual private network.

Gli AWS Discovery Day sono eventi online completamente gratuiti, pensati per introdurre i concetti del cloud computing di AWS e le opportunità di utilizzo più interessanti. Ogni giornata è dedicata ai clienti che sono appena entrati nel mondo AWS e vogliono comprenderne a pieno le reali potenzialità.
More than a year has passed since AWS CDK went GA and it has grown into a family of products (AWS CDK, CDKTF, CDK8s). Let’s take one day and talk Serverless and multi cloud all in CDK

A one of a kind live event about all things serverless. Join us for a half day of conversations at Microsoft Create: Serverless and connect with the experts and community members to discuss how you can run code for any application without having to manage servers.
ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.

Join us for our online edition of the ServerlessDays Amsterdam meetup, planned for October. We'll do a live stream with 2 public talks + QA session, featuring 2 amazing guest speakers: Natalia Pipas (Data Engineer at VONQ) & Zamira Jaupaj (Solution Architect at Mobiquity).
We bring together the world’s leading software architects and cloud experts to share their ideas and knowledge.
Third edition of ServerlessDays Virtual with a busload of great speakers and talks.
